briefDescription: A real estate marketplace where users can list, review, and make offers on properties with secure payments.
challengesFaced: Synchronizing offer status between buyer and agent dashboards and integrating Stripe payment flow with offer validation.
potentialImprovements: Add AI-driven property recommendations, integrate map-based search, and implement chat between buyers and agents.

briefDescription: A platform to discover, join, or create local hobby-based groups with events and discussions.
challengesFaced: Managing group privacy and invitation logic while keeping event RSVPs consistent across all members.
potentialImprovements: Introduce mobile app, enable live streaming of group events, and integrate a recommendation engine for hobbies.

briefDescription: A platform to organize and manage marathon events with participant registration and live updates.
challengesFaced: Handling high concurrent registrations and dynamically updating participant statistics in real time.
potentialImprovements: Add wearable device integration for live tracking, implement fundraising features, and enable team-based marathons.

briefDescription: User can know about yoga and practice yoga with instructors through online
challengesFaced: Managing routine and need to update the routine each month .
potentialImprovements: Implement Payment gateway and ecommerce mangement

briefDescription: An online course platform with a doctors apoointment management system
challengesFaced: Designing flexible appointment management with real time and date
potentialImprovements: Add Live counseling through google meet and zoom meeting app
